TopicTitle: Anyone experiencing a performance issue with new update?

Articles.Content:
I started a new career and my first launch with a 3 part rocket was giving me yellow in the timer at normal speed.

This did not happen to me before until I started building complex/many part vehicles.

I am comparing old vanilla to new.

Check your settings Ã¢â‚¬â€œ it's possible that they have been replaced due to the update.

Otherwise, please follow the Stock Support & Bug Reporting Guide. We need good information to help.

The settings.cfg file should be compatible between the two versions. So you can also try copying over your old settings, or just manually update them as Master Tao suggests.

Cheers,

~Claw
